consolidation_metadata.indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom a therapy other than docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: patient-individual therapy, taking into account previous therapy and histology with selection of afatinib, pemetrexed, erlotinib, docetaxel in combination with ramucirumab, docetaxel in combination with nintedanib and vinorelbine

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom a therapy other than docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: patient-individual therapy, taking into account previous therapy and histology with selection of afatinib, pemetrexed, erlotinib, docetaxel in combination with ramucirumab, docetaxel in combination with nintedanib and vinorelbine

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: different chemotherapies without platinum (cisplatin/ carboplatin) as well as treatment with an immune checkpoint inhibitor as monotherapy

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: different chemotherapies without platinum (cisplatin/ carboplatin) as well as treatment with an immune checkpoint inhibitor as monotherapy

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in case of predominantly squamous histology)

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in case of predominantly squamous histology)

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: pembrolizumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours (PD-L1 expression ≥ 1% of tumour cells))

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: pembrolizumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours (PD-L1 expression ≥ 1% of tumour cells))

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
consolidated_picos.Comparator: docetaxel in combination with nintedanib (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and adenocarcinoma histology)

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Grouping_Key.comparator: docetaxel in combination with nintedanib (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and adenocarcinoma histology)

consolidated_picos.Population: patients treated with immunotherapy monotherapy in the first line
consolidated_picos.Comparator: chemotherapy based on platinum salts, such as in the 1st line: cisplatin-vinorelbine, cisplatine-citagembine, carboplatin-paclitaxel, cisplain-docetaxel, Cisplatin-pemetrexed (non-epidermoid only)

Grouping_Key.population: patients treated with immunotherapy monotherapy in the first line
Grouping_Key.comparator: chemotherapy based on platinum salts, such as in the 1st line: cisplatin-vinorelbine, cisplatine-citagembine, carboplatin-paclitaxel, cisplain-docetaxel, Cisplatin-pemetrexed (non-epidermoid only)

consolidated_picos.Population: patients treated with chemotherapeutic therapy + immunotherapies in the line 1
consolidated_picos.Comparator: chemotherapists in the single line: pemetrexed, docetaxel (non-epidermoside only)

Grouping_Key.population: patients treated with chemotherapeutic therapy + immunotherapies in the line 1
